question.text:
Given below are two statements : one is labelled as Assertion (A) and the other is labelled as Reason (R).
Assertion (A) : Aluminium is extracted from bauxite by the electrolysis of molten mixture of Al2O3 with cryolite.
Reason (R) : The oxidation state of Al in cryolite is +3.
In the light of the above statements, choose the most appropriate answer from the options given below :

options.text: Both (A) and (R) are correct and (R) is the correct explanation of (A).
Both (A) and (R) are correct but (R) is not the correct explanation of (A).

solution.text: In electrolytic reduction of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>Al</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> we use cryolite to increase conductivity and decrease melting point. Cryolyte is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>Na</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msub><mi>AIF</mi><mn>6</mn></msub><mo>,</mo></math> Oxidation number of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Al</mi></math> is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></math>

data.bucket: Must Do Ques (JEE Main) - Any Difficulty
